weekly_top_story.headline: Russia Launches Massive Overnight Drone and Missile Attack on Ukraine, Including Nuclear-Capable Hypersonic Missile
weekly_top_story.summary: Russia fired a hypersonic nuclear-capable ballistic missile for the second time, killing four in Kyiv and cutting off power and water to over a million in southeastern Ukraine, escalating the conflict and raising fears of broader nuclear risks.

stories.headline: Anti-government protests continue in a number of Iranian cities despite a new nationwide internet blackout
stories.summary: Protests in Iran over economic crisis have led to at least 45 deaths amid a government internet shutdown and U.S. threats of intervention, potentially destabilizing the regime and heightening regional tensions.

stories.headline: Trump cancels second wave of attacks on Venezuela after interim government agrees to cooperate
stories.summary: Following a U.S. attack and abduction of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, the interim government released prisoners and cooperated on issues like oil, averting further escalation but signaling aggressive U.S. intervention in Latin America.
